Liverpool aims 'strange birds' in Serie A

Football Andree · 27/08/2023 · Liverpool

﻿According to Calciomercato, The Kop has jumped into the race to recruit a versatile Italian player on the Juventus payroll.

Liverpool have joined the race to sign full-back Andrea Cambiaso . In the 2022/2023 season, the Italian player impressed when playing for Bologna on loan from Juventus.

According to a report from Calciomercato, The Kop are the latest team to express an interest in Cambiaso alongside Tottenham Hotspur and Nottingham Forest.

The ability to play versatile, flexible where Cambiaso scored strong points with Liverpool. Besides the position of full-back, the 23-year-old star can play well when he is assigned to play as a winger when needed. That promises to give Jurgen Klopp a variety of tactical options.

Liverpool need to strengthen the defense system this season. The series of friendlies last summer showed big holes in the back four. The two full-back positions of Andrew Robertson and Trent Alexander-Arnold need more quality B plans.

This season, Cambiaso returned to Juventus. The 23-year-old player entered the typical team of the first round of Serie A voted by the Whoscored site.

Cambiaso is likely to become Liverpool's last rookie at the 2023 summer market. Before that, the Anfield team missed two goals Moises Caicedo and Romeo Lavia.
